name: Margot's Bepuzzled
overview: If you've been craving a puzzle fix, you might want to join the lovable Margot as she returns in another fantastic and in-depth puzzling game to challenge you on Nintendo DS and Wii. Margot's Bepuzzled! has bags and bags of puzzles and fun to keep all the family entertained for hours on end. Whether you are a true Puzzle King or a novice, Margot's Bepuzzled! has something for everyone to sink their teeth into. Players looking to put their grey matter to the test can choose from a whole host of comprehensive puzzling games from a megatastic 1001 puzzles with 6 classic modes and 19 different variations to choose from. Puzzles include the likes of crosswords, sudoku (hard, regular, junior & mini, so don't worry if you're a novice), wordsearch (regular and mini), kakuro (regular & mini), Kriss Kross (regular and mini) and number jigs (crossword puzzles with numbers instead of words). You can play solo against the computer or challenge a friend or relative in a head to head hotseat mode. If you are on a coffee break, on a bus, in the playground or at home, Margots Bepuzzled! is the must have game of the year for puzzle aficionados.
